CREATE TABLE exam_marks(
St_id CHAR(6),
C_code CHAR(6),
Quiz_01 DECIMAL(5,2),
Quiz_02 DECIMAL(5,2),
Quiz_03 DECIMAL(5,2),
Assignment DECIMAL(5,2),
Mid DECIMAL(5,2),
Final DECIMAL(5,2),
FOREIGN KEY(St_id) REFERENCES student(St_id),
FOREIGN KEY(C_code) REFERENCES course(C_code)
);



INSERT INTO exam_marks (St_id, C_code, Quiz_01, Quiz_02, Quiz_03, Assignment, Mid, Final) VALUES
